title: Broken By Birth
description: Evil Is Born Joshua enters the world in a gritty basement apartment beneath the shadow of an old water tower. He was beaten, neglected, and by the end of his first day of life, abandoned. Haunted family trees, chilling photo insights, and twisted psychopaths tell Joshua’s bone-chilling story. He’s followed from womb through foster care, ending in the numbing terror of his forever home. Joshua is the son of Ayla and Mack – the unknown baby in Broken By Truth. How is he connected to The Senator? Is he doomed for evil? What is his true legacy? Broken By Birth re-invents the thriller – blending fact, fiction, and photos into a riveting story you’ll never forget.
author: Jeri Fink
